meanings.definition: A drink of an alcoholic beverage.
meanings.sent1: After a long day, he enjoyed a joypop with his friends.
meanings.sent2: The bartender served a refreshing joypop to the customer.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone raised their joypops in a toast.
meanings.sent4: The clinking of glasses filled the room with the sound of joypops.
meanings.sent5: The golden liquid in the glass shimmered, inviting him to savor the joypop.

meanings.definition: To drink an alcoholic beverage for pleasure.
meanings.sent1: She decided to joypop responsibly and not overindulge.
meanings.sent2: Friends often gather to joypop and unwind after work.
meanings.sent3: The group planned to joypop together at the upcoming celebration.
meanings.sent4: He would joypop slowly, savoring each sip of the fine wine.
meanings.sent5: The laughter and chatter in the bar made it the perfect place to joypop.
